metadata.title: CVE-2016-10245 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient sanitization of the query parameter intemplates/html/search_opensearch.php could lead to reflected cross-sitescripting or iframe injection.

criterions.comment: doxygen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
quantlib-refman-html: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
